heading: HTML
title: What is it?
text: HTML stands for Hyper Text Markup Language. It is the standard language for creating web pages.

heading: HTML
title: History
text: Tim Berners-Lee is credited with creating the language.

heading: HTML
title: How do I start?
text: Every HTML document starts with the same exact format no matter what editor you use. It's <!DOCTYPE> <html><head></head><body></body></html>. Any context that is entered between the <body> tags will be shown (rendered) on the webpage.

heading: HTML
title: Tags
text:
HTML tags are where information gets broken down into sections on a page.

-

are Headings. These are ranked from largest (1) to smallest (6) heading sizes.

are used to identify paragraphs. tags are used to identify weblinks. You surround web page addresses with , and this will display a clickable link to that page. allows you to add images to your web page. These are the basics needed to create your first webpage. There are others like

and but those I will discuss in more detail
